article_title: Chattanooga therapy clinic closed amid TBI medicaid fraud investigation

article_metadata.description: The Chattanooga children's therapy company that abruptly shut down last week is being investigated for fraud by the Tennessee Bureau of Investigation's Medicaid Fraud Control Unit, according to the TBI.

og.description: The Chattanooga children's therapy company that abruptly shut down last week is being investigated for fraud by the Tennessee Bureau of Investigation's Medicaid Fraud Control Unit, according to the TBI.
